author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D., Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
title: Rome Mayor Uses Drone to Hunt Down, Fine Jogger During Lockdown
description: Rome mayor Virginia Raggi boasted on social media this week that she used a drone to track down and eventually fine a jogger who violated the coronavirus lockdown.
content:
ROME Rome mayor Virginia Raggi boasted on social media this week that she used a drone to track down and eventually fine a jogger who violated the coronavirus lockdown.
On Easter Monday in Rome, local police carried out more than 14,000 checks and issued 162… [+1514 chars]
